info:
It listen to the SPS CPU start signle 
It does this by reading every second the flag
form the  ns=4;i=12;datatype=Boolean OPC UA server interface.
When this flag is true and the codeReadDone is false , means we have to respond to the request, by returning the corresponding
ziel for a given code ( that we recieve from the SPS)
we save the  flag read form SPS in the  global variable "start"
then we read the code from  ns=4;i=14;datatype=String and
we store it in the global variable "code"
 and set codeReadDone to be true
